或者：

“有一次学习一个新程序，发现我把它 misuse了一些。大家可以帮我 debug一下问题吗？”

machine learning 是一种基于计算机和数据的 intelligent systems 的技术，它可以识别、学习、预测和反馈。think of it like a super-smart robot that can improve its skills over time, just like how I would need to improve my playing abilities in music.
